biotools.summary:
Molecular Prognostic Indicators in Cirrhosis Database for Clinical Context-Specific in Silico Prognostic Biomarker Validation.

Molecular Prognostic Indicators in Cirrhosis.

Database for clinical context-specific in silico prognostic biomarker validation.

This is a system that enables quick and easy assessment of user’s prognostic gene signature in various liver disease patient cohorts for a specific clinical outcome
